profile.rationale: The job advertisement only provides the title 'Software Engineer'. While this title strongly suggests a role focused on traditional software development (Macro-Category A) without AI/ML integration, the absence of any descriptive text means no specific tasks, technologies, or skills could be analyzed to confirm this. Therefore, the classification is based solely on the job title.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement consists solely of a title ('Software Engineer') with no descriptive text regarding responsibilities, technologies, or skills. This lack of information makes any analysis highly speculative and prevents a confident classification.
